rampant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control
rampant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Pickpocketing is rampant in the downtown area.
rampant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a plant that is rampant grows and spreads quickly, in a way that is difficult to control
